text: @Acyn Trump has no idea how to pre-emptively attack coronavirus. He will wait too long because he refuses to allow the scientists & doctors to take the lead. Pence is an anti-science fool. He's created an epidemic in Indiana because he disagreed with health officials when governor.

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
